name: ヒューマノイドドラゴン /  Hyūmanoidodoragon
description: Humanoid Dragon. A magical Yōkai creature that sometimes takes the form of a human but only lasts for a few hours. According to legend, a Geisha was seduced by the charms of a flying dragon and got her pregnant. But she abandoned the creature in the forest a few days after it was born. It was raised by an old woman in a cabin far from the city, deep in the woods. She received the gift of longevity and lived 135 years. Weird Japanese Toys, 2021.
